name: Three Little Pigs Theatre
description:
The Three Little Pigs - Puppet Theatre for Kids
Your child can host their own puppet show.

Great app for kids who love to play with puppets and put on shows, on this app there is 5 Characters from The Three Little Pigs and lots of backdrops from the classic show.

How to use
Simply pick 1 (Or More) of the characters and move them around the screen just like you would on a real puppet theatre, double click to remove
Swipe left/right to change the backdrop of your play
Can move all 5 characters at once so great to play with friends
Double tap on a character to remove them

Will keep kids entertained for hours

Produced by http://www.slinkyapps.co.uk
